text: Answer: 2221 Solution: Given that physical address = 7341, therefore the frame number is floor [7341/1024] = 7 and offset is 173. Frame number 7 store the page number 2 (from the page table) so base address of page number 2 is 2 x 1024 =2048. Therefore, virtual address is base address + offset = 2048 + 173 = 2221.
